# Ahmad Hassan — Software Engineer & Full Stack Developer

> Ahmad Hassan is a Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer from Pakistan. He works at VieroMind and studies at MNS University of Agriculture, Multan. He builds web applications with TypeScript, Next.js, Golang, and AWS, contributes to open source, and writes technical blogs about cloud computing, web development, system design, and shell scripting. His portfolio is built with Hugo and the PaperMod theme, deployed on Vercel.

## Main Pages

- [About](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/about/): Background, experience, open source contributions, competitive programming achievements, and contact information
- [Projects](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/projects/): Showcase of 7 featured projects — full-stack web apps, open-source tools, and developer infrastructure built with Next.js, TypeScript, AWS, and more
- [Certifications & Achievements](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/certifications/): 21 professional certifications from AWS, Meta, Google, GitHub, IBM, HackerRank, Harvard, UC Davis, and DeepLearning.AI, plus a timeline of major achievements
- [Tools & Setup](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/tools/): Detailed writeup of the software, tools, and developer environment used daily — Arch Linux, Hyprland, Neovim, Zsh, and more
- [Blog](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/): 41 technical articles covering AWS cloud, web development, system design, databases, shell scripting, and personal topics
- [Chat](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/chat/): AI-powered chatbot (Google Gemini with RAG) that answers questions about Ahmad's work, projects, and background
- [Search](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/search/): Full-text fuzzy search across all content powered by Fuse.js
- [Categories](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/categories/): Blog posts organized by category — tech, web, and life
- [Resume](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/Ahmad-Hassan-Resume.pdf): Downloadable PDF resume

## Projects

- [HyprFlux](https://hyprflux.dev): Hyprland dotfiles and configs for a minimal Arch Linux desktop. 800+ GitHub stars. Technologies: Linux, Arch Linux, Hyprland, Waybar, Shell, CSS. [Source](https://github.com/ahmad9059/HyprFlux)
- [SehatScan](https://sehatscan.vercel.app): AI-powered health assessment platform that analyzes medical documents and facial images for personalized health insights. Technologies: Python, Next.js, TypeScript, AWS, Redis, PostgreSQL, Prisma, Google Gemini. [Source](https://github.com/ahmad9059/SehatScan)
- [HisaabScore](https://hisaabscore.vercel.app): AI-powered alternative credit scoring system for gig workers and people in the informal economy. Technologies: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, Firebase, Google Genkit, Gemini 2.0, Prisma. [Source](https://github.com/ahmad9059/HisaabScore)
- [RAF-SP](https://raf-sp.vercel.app): Agricultural data management system. Technologies: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, Prisma, Supabase, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion
- [UAM Tracker](https://uam-tracker.vercel.app): GPA/CGPA tracker for university students. Technologies: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, Prisma, PostgreSQL, Better Auth, Recharts. [Source](https://github.com/ahmad9059/uam-tracker)
- [MindOasis](https://mindoasis.vercel.app): Mental health professional finder for users in Pakistan, powered by AI-generated profile summaries. Built at a hackathon. Technologies: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, shadcn/ui, Firebase Genkit, Gemini. [Source](https://github.com/ahmad9059/MindOasis)
- [CodingHawks](https://codinghawks.vercel.app): Official website for the Coding Hawks Society at MNS University of Agriculture. Technologies: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind, Prisma, Supabase, shadcn/ui. [Source](https://github.com/ahmad9059/codinghawks)

## Blog Posts — AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Series

- [Cloud Computing](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-cloud-computing/): AWS CCP notes on cloud computing fundamentals
- [IAM (Identity and Access Management)](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-iam-identity-and-access-management/): AWS IAM users, groups, policies, roles, and security
- [EC2 - Elastic Compute Cloud](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-ec2-elastic-compute-cloud/): AWS EC2 instances, types, purchasing options, and setup
- [EC2 - Instance Storage](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-ec2-instance-storage/): EBS volumes, snapshots, AMIs, and storage options
- [ELB & ASG](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-elb-asg-elastic-load-balancing-auto-scaling-groups/): Elastic Load Balancing and Auto Scaling Groups
- [Amazon S3](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-amazon-s3/): S3 buckets, storage classes, versioning, and lifecycle
- [Databases & Analytics](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-databases-analytics/): RDS, Aurora, DynamoDB, Redshift, and analytics services
- [Other Compute Services](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-other-compute-services-ecs-lambda-batch-lightsail/): ECS, Lambda, Batch, and Lightsail
- [Deployments & Managing Infrastructure at Scale](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-deployments-managing-infrastructure-at-scale/): CloudFormation, Elastic Beanstalk, CodeDeploy, and more
- [Leveraging the AWS Global Infrastructure](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-leveraging-the-aws-global-infrastructure/): Route 53, CloudFront, Global Accelerator, and edge services
- [Cloud Integrations](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-cloud-integrations/): SQS, SNS, Kinesis, and Amazon MQ
- [Cloud Monitoring](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-cloud-monitoring/): CloudWatch, CloudTrail, X-Ray, and monitoring tools
- [VPC & Networking](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-vpc-networking/): VPC, subnets, security groups, NACLs, and networking
- [Security & Compliance](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-security-compliance/): AWS security services, compliance programs, and encryption
- [Machine Learning](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-machine-learning/): SageMaker, Rekognition, Comprehend, and ML services
- [Account Management, Billing & Support](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-account-management-billing-support/): AWS Organizations, billing, pricing, and support plans
- [Advanced Identity](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-advanced-identity/): AWS STS, Cognito, Directory Services, and IAM Identity Center
- [Other Services](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/aws-ccp-other-services/): Additional AWS services overview

## Blog Posts — Web Development

- [HTML - The Language of the Web](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/html/): Comprehensive guide to HTML elements, forms, and semantics
- [CSS - Cascading Style Sheets](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/css/): CSS fundamentals, selectors, box model, flexbox, grid, and responsive design
- [Tailwind CSS](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/tailwind-css/): Utility-first CSS framework guide
- [Fundamentals of JavaScript](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/fundamentals-of-javascript/): JavaScript basics — variables, types, operators, control flow, and functions
- [JavaScript Advanced Concepts](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/javascript-advanced/): Closures, prototypes, classes, modules, and advanced patterns
- [DOM Manipulation in JavaScript](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/dom-js/): Selecting, modifying, and interacting with DOM elements
- [Asynchronous JavaScript](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/asynchronous-js/): Promises, async/await, fetch API, and event loop
- [React – A JavaScript Library](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/reactjs/): React components, hooks, state management, and building UIs
- [GSAP & Locomotive Scroll](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/gsap-locomotive/): Animation library integration for smooth web animations
- [Becoming a Full-Stack Web Developer in 2025](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/web-dev-roadmap/): Complete roadmap for web development careers
- [Build an AI Chatbot Web App with Google Gemini](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/chatbot/): Tutorial on building and deploying an AI chatbot on Vercel

## Blog Posts — System Design & Architecture

- [CAP Theorem](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/cap-theorem/): Consistency, availability, and partition tolerance in distributed systems
- [Event Driven Architecture](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/event-driven-architecture/): Event-based system design patterns and implementation
- [Microservice Architecture](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/microservice-architecture/): Microservices design, communication, and deployment patterns

## Blog Posts — Databases

- [Introduction to Databases - MySQL](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/mysql/): MySQL fundamentals, queries, and database design
- [MS SQL Server and Azure Data Studio on Arch Linux](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/sqlserver/): Setting up SQL Server development environment on Linux

## Blog Posts — Shell Scripting & Linux

- [Introduction to Shell Scripting](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/intro-to-shell-scripting/): Shell scripting basics, commands, and automation
- [Variables in Shell Scripting](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/variable-in-shell-scripting/): Variable declaration, types, and usage in shell scripts
- [Shell Expansion in Shell Scripting](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/shell-expansion/): Parameter expansion, command substitution, and arithmetic expansion
- [Shell Operation in Shell Scripting](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/shell-operation-shell-scripting/): Shell operations, control structures, and script execution
- [Setting Up MPD and RMPC](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/setup-mpd-and-rmpc/): Music Player Daemon and RMPC client setup on Linux
- [Arch Linux Installation on VMware](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/vmware-archlinux-installation/): Step-by-step guide for installing Arch Linux in a virtual machine

## Blog Posts — Other

- [The 80/20 Principle](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/80-20-rule/): Productivity and the Pareto principle applied to work and life
- [What It Means to Feel for Someone](https://ahmadx.vercel.app/posts/forher/): Personal reflections on relationships and emotional depth

## Technical Stack

- **Languages:** TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Golang, SQL, Shell/Bash
- **Frontend:** React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion, GSAP
- **Backend:** Node.js, Next.js API Routes, Golang, Vercel Serverless Functions
- **Databases:** PostgreSQL, MySQL, MS SQL Server, Redis, Supabase, Firebase
- **Cloud & DevOps:** AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, and more), Vercel, Docker
- **AI/ML:** Google Gemini API, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), Firebase Genkit
- **Tools:** Neovim, VSCodium, Git, Arch Linux, Hyprland, Zsh
- **Site Generator:** Hugo with PaperMod theme
